data.actual_result: The button is in white colour which makes the text difficult to read.
data.expected_result: The button in which the ignore text is written is in black colour as in version 7.4.5
data.short_description: The "Ignore" text in the profile of a person from whom you have an incoming friend request is kinda difficult to see on light theme.
data.steps_to_repro: - Ask someone to send you a FR. - Open the sender's profile. - Observe the ignore text.
